isilib A Python library for simplifying bibliometric research of Web of Science data

Installation

The download from Github includes a customized Vagrant file that installs isilib and other useful Python libraries. It is currently the easiest way of getting isilib working if you are not already using Python. Of course it is also possible to install isilib without using Vagrant.

Install with Vagrant
